abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising campaign; new ad campaign by the law firm Jacoby & Meyers is taking an unconventional approach by eschewing lawyers and employing humor.
snippet: A new campaign by the law firm Jacoby & Meyers is taking an unconventional approach by eschewing lawyers and employing humor in its television commercials.
lead_paragraph: A new campaign by the law firm Jacoby & Meyers is taking an unconventional approach by eschewing lawyers and employing humor in its television commercials.

headline.main: Winning Is Everything, or So Says a Law Firm
